external_games.name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Maze of the Dead

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Maze of the Dead
summary: The Eleventh Doctor has reached the Maze of the Dead. He has to race through the chambers, dodge the Weeping Angels and scan the boxes to reach the Byzantium space ship. Furthermore the batteries of his torch run out after some time, he needs to scan the boxes for spares. If it's completely dark the Weeping Angels attack.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Doctor Who Monster Invasion: Maze of the Dead
